ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.P1: As a passionate and dedicated software developer, I began learning IT at a very young age.
ABOUT.P2: Over the past four years, I have been developing my Fullstack skills, focusing on building innovative and robust web and mobile apps using new technologies â€” including client communication, API integration, and AI features.
